title: URF 2016
body: Will URF be coming back this year, I'm getting real excited for tommorow coz its April fools{{champion:238}}

replies.body:
Dear Riot
It is 12:06am Friday in oce and still no URF. Plz do something about this like perhaps extend URF for an extra day {{champion:81}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:13}}
They are releasing it at 11:00 man i just found out
yeh its almost 12:30 and im still waiting {{item:3070}}
Oh wow 7:30am, we are gonna have no time to play if its not released soon

Rito had said somewhere (I can't find that forum post anymore...) that URF mode will be back twice this year, but not on April 1st.
There had been some speculation that it may show up tomorrow (March 31st), then leave on April 1st, and return again on April 2nd, thus fulfilling both the coming twice this year and not being available on April 1st, but there's no official word on that theory.
